entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this morning then periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
